Articles.Content:
I've just been watching a YouTube video about the next Xbox console and one thing jumped out at me.

The official statement from Microsoft is the most Xbox one titles will be backwards compatible at launch.

MOST

So I guess I'm asking if we can get confirmation that Enhanced edition will be compatible with the new generation of consoles, and if so, what (if any) improvements in game performance are we likely to see?

Edited September 19, 2020 by Broke dead dogg
